title: AI Image Generator
description: A web application that uses Stable Diffusion to generate images from text prompts. Features a gallery of generated images and user authentication.

title: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio website built with Next.js and Framer Motion. Showcases my projects, skills, and experience with a modern dark theme.

title: E-commerce Dashboard
description: A comprehensive dashboard for managing online stores. Includes real-time analytics, inventory management, and order processing.
